attributes.action: compel the relevant industries to reduce their emissions by 2010, thus removing the burden from us, the users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government should pass legislation to compel the following carbon savings.
 Electricity companies to make 20% of generation emission-free by 2010.

20% of cars sold to be emission free by 2010 (Hydrogen gas or electricity powered or similar). Manufacturers not complying would be refused permission to sell vehicles here.

20% of air flights to be by airship (powered by hydrogen, electricity, etc - cargo flights and short flights mainly),  or the aircraft industry must develop emission-free aircraft engines.
20% of ships docking to be powered by emission-free engines or bio-fuel, or operators must pay a 'carbon tax'.

20% of all 'dirty' fuel to be carbon neutral(bio-fuel etc.).

Councils and public bodies to be compelled to reduce their carbon footprint by 30% by 2010 - they could turn off motorway lights, stop floodlighting buildings, etc..

Any savings we as individuals make would then be in addition to the above, and would have the incentive of saving us money.
